biotools.summary: AGenDA is a web tool that compares the genomic sequences from evolutionarily related organisms in order to make gene predictions.  It takes pairs of genomic sequences as input, aligns the sequences, and makes predictions based on splice signals, start and stop codons, and areas of conserved sequence.
